title: Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Thick, airy pancakes bursting with fresh blueberries and a hint of vanilla, perfect for a comforting weekend breakfast.
steps: Whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt together in a large bowl.
Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg, vanilla, and melted butter.
Mix until just combined, leaving small lumps in the batter to ensure fluffiness.
Gently fold in the fresh blueberries.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium heat.
Pour approximately ¼ cup of batter onto the griddle for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface and the edges look dry, about 3 minutes.
Flip carefully and cook until browned on the other side, about 2 minutes.
Serve warm with maple syrup and butter.
